summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby to Jeanne regarding the status of accounts at JPMorgan related to Southern Financial. Amanda is inquiring about the consolidation of positions in preparation for a full transfer of an account. The email indicates a professional relationship and a request for assistance.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is reaching out to Jeanne to check on the status of accounts at JPMorgan related to Southern Financial.

persons.name: Jeanne
persons.context: Jeanne is the recipient of the email and is being asked to assist with checking the accounts at JPMorgan.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
The email discusses checking the status of accounts at JPMorgan related to Southern Financial.
Amanda is waiting to send transfer instructions until the positions are consolidated.
